mapper.insert: insert into Customer (customerId, nickname, grade, tel, location, status, createdTime, gender, birthday) values (#{customerId},#{nickname}, #{grade}, #{tel}, #{location}, #{status}, #{createdTIme}, #{gender}, #{birthday});
mapper.update: update subOrder set orderstatus = '1' where (select * from subOrder where customerId = #{customerId} where goodId = #{goodId} as tempOrder);
